trans-unit.source: Defines and represents a dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 定義及表示動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly is an assembly that is created using the Reflection Emit APIs.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件是使用反映發出 Api 建立組件。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic modules in the assembly are saved when the dynamic assembly is saved using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用儲存動態組件時，會儲存組件中的動態模組<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To generate an executable, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A> method must be called to identify the method that is the entry point to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生可執行檔<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>必須呼叫方法，來識別組件的進入點的方法。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are saved as DLLs by default, unless the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A> method requests the generation of a console application or a Windows-based application.
trans-unit.target: 組件會儲存為 Dll 根據預設，除非<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>方法會要求在產生的主控台應用程式或 Windows 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic assembly contains more than one dynamic module, the assembly's manifest file name should match the module's name that is specified as the first argument to the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果是動態組件包含一個以上的動態模組，組件的資訊清單檔案名稱應該符合模組的名稱指定為第一個引數<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Some methods on the base <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> class, such as `GetModules` and `GetLoadedModules`, will not work correctly when called from <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> objects.
trans-unit.target: 有些方法在基底<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>類別，例如`GetModules`和`GetLoadedModules`，將無法正常運作時從呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can load the defined dynamic assembly and call the methods on the loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以載入定義動態組件，並載入的組件上呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, to ensure that resource modules are included in the returned module list, call `GetModules` on the loaded <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要確保傳回的模組清單中，包含資源模組，呼叫`GetModules`上載入<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>物件。

trans-unit.source: The signing of a dynamic assembly using <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.KeyPair%2A> is not effective until the assembly is saved to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用的動態組件的簽章<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.KeyPair%2A>沒有作用，直到組件儲存至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: So, strong names will not work with transient dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 因此，強式名稱不適用於暫時性動態組件。

trans-unit.source: To get an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object, use the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件，請使用<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Reflection emit dynamic assembly scenarios
trans-unit.target: 反映發出動態組件的案例

trans-unit.source: The following are some things to consider when using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> class to create dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 下列是使用時要考慮的事項<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>類別來建立動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic modules
trans-unit.target: 動態模組

trans-unit.source: Reflection emit supports the creation of dynamic modules defined in dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 反映發出支援建立動態組件中定義的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic module created in a dynamic assembly can be transient or persistable.
trans-unit.target: 建立動態組件中的動態模組可以是暫時性或永久性。

trans-unit.source: Restrictions on type references
trans-unit.target: 型別參考的限制

trans-unit.source: Assemblies can reference types defined in another assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件可以參考另一個組件中定義的型別。

trans-unit.source: A transient dynamic assembly can safely reference types defined in another transient dynamic assembly, a persistable dynamic assembly, or a static assembly.
trans-unit.target: 暫時性動態組件可以安全地參考另一個暫時性動態組件、 永久性的動態組件或靜態組件中定義的型別。

trans-unit.source: However, the common language runtime does not allow a persistable dynamic module to reference a type defined in a transient dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 不過，common language runtime 不允許參考類型的暫時性動態模組中定義永久性動態模組。

trans-unit.source: This is because when the persisted dynamic module is loaded after being saved to disk, the runtime cannot resolve the references to types defined in the transient dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為當之後要儲存到磁碟，執行階段載入保存的動態模組無法解析的參考至暫時性動態模組中定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: Restrictions on emitting to remote application domains
trans-unit.target: 發出遠端應用程式定義域的限制

trans-unit.source: Some scenarios require a dynamic assembly to be created and executed in a remote application domain.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下會需要建立與遠端應用程式定義域中執行的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Reflection emit does not allow a dynamic assembly to be emitted directly to a remote application domain.
trans-unit.target: 反映發出不允許直接與遠端應用程式定義域發出動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The solution is to emit the dynamic assembly in the current application domain, save the emitted dynamic assembly to disk, and then load the dynamic assembly into the remote application domain.
trans-unit.target: 解決方案是發出動態組件目前的應用程式定義域中，發出動態組件儲存至磁碟，然後載入遠端應用程式定義域中的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assembly access modes
trans-unit.target: 動態組件存取模式

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies can be created using one of the following access modes:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列存取模式的其中一種建立動態組件：

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly represented by an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object is transient.
trans-unit.target: 表示的動態組件<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件是暫時性。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly can only be used to execute the emitted code.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件只可用來執行發出程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly represented by an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object is persistable but cannot be executed until the saved portable executable (PE) file has been loaded from disk.
trans-unit.target: 表示的動態組件<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件是否為永續性，但無法執行，直到已經從磁碟載入已儲存的可攜式執行檔 (PE) 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly represented by an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object is persistable, but can also be executed before and/or after the assembly is saved to disk.
trans-unit.target: 表示的動態組件<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件是永久性的但也可以執行之前和/或之後的組件儲存至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The access mode must be specified by providing the appropriate <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess> value in the call to the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method when the dynamic assembly is defined and cannot be changed later.
trans-unit.target: 必須指定的存取模式，藉由提供適當<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess>的呼叫中的值<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法時的動態組件定義和稍後無法變更。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the access mode of a dynamic assembly to optimize the assembly's internal representation.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段使用的動態組件的存取模式，來最佳化組件的內部表示法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用一個模組的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 範例組件中的模組包含一種類型， `MyDynamicType`，其中包含私用欄位、 取得和設定私用欄位的屬性、 建構函式會初始化私用欄位和將私用欄位的使用者提供數字相乘的方法值，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified when the assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave?displayProperty=nameWithType> 建立組件時指定的。

trans-unit.source: The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program.
trans-unit.target: 立即使用組件程式碼和組件也會儲存至磁碟，以便可以檢查與[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或用於另一個程式。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 叫用時晚期繫結透過機制例如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing resource file to this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 將現有的資源檔加入這個組件。

trans-unit.source: The logical name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的邏輯名稱。

trans-unit.source: The physical file name (.resources file) to which the logical name is mapped.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯名稱對應到實體檔案名稱 (.resources 檔案)。

trans-unit.source: This should not include a path; the file must be in the same directory as the assembly to which it is added.
trans-unit.target: 這不應該包含路徑；該檔案必須與要加入該檔案的組件位於相同目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing resource file to this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 將現有的資源檔加入這個組件。

trans-unit.source: `fileName` should not be the same as that of any other persistable module, standalone managed resource, or the standalone manifest file.
trans-unit.target: `fileName` 不能與任何其他永久性模組、 獨立受管理資源或獨立的資訊清單檔案的相同。

trans-unit.source: The managed resources in the file are assumed to be public.
trans-unit.target: Managed 的資源檔中會假設為公用。

trans-unit.source: The specified resource file must be in the directory where the assembly will be saved.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資源檔必須儲存組件的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.target: 動態模組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Must be less than 260 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 長度必須小於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Defines a named transient dynamic module in this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在此組件中定義具名的暫時性動態模組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder" /> representing the defined dynamic module.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder" />，代表定義的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它是組件中定義多個具有相同名稱的動態模組的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The defined dynamic module is transient.
trans-unit.target: 定義的動態模組是暫時性的。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave>.
trans-unit.target: 無法儲存動態模組，即使父動態組件以建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave>。

trans-unit.source: To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute> attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵錯動態模組時隱藏最佳化，套用<xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute>屬性設定為動態組件，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute> with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute.DebuggingModes.DisableOptimizations> flag and apply it using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute>與<xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute.DebuggingModes.DisableOptimizations>旗標，並將它使用套用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetCustomAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 屬性必須套用至動態組件。

trans-unit.source: It has no effect if applied to the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果套用至模組，它沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: Defines a persistable dynamic module with the given name that will be saved to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 以會儲存在指定檔案的指定名稱定義永久性動態模組。

trans-unit.target: 沒有發出任何符號資訊。

trans-unit.source: To define a persistable dynamic module, this assembly needs to be created with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.Save> or the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義永久性動態模組，這個組件必須具有建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.Save>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you want the module to contain the assembly manifest, `name` should be the same as the name of the assembly (that is, the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> used to create the dynamic assembly) and `fileName` should be the same as the filename you specify when you save the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要包含的組件資訊清單模組`name`應該是相同的組件名稱 (也就是<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>用來建立動態組件) 和`fileName`應該相同您指定當您將儲存組件檔名。

trans-unit.source: In an assembly with only one module, that module should contain the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個模組的組件，在該模組應該包含組件資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute> attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵錯動態模組時隱藏最佳化，套用<xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggableAttribute>屬性設定為動態組件，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 屬性必須套用至動態組件。

trans-unit.source: It has no effect if applied to the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果套用至模組，它沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This assembly's custom attributes override information specified in the `AssemblyName` object.
trans-unit.target: 這個組件的自訂屬性會覆寫資訊中指定`AssemblyName`物件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.target: 描述所有適用這個組件的著作權標示、商標及註冊商標。

trans-unit.source: This should include the full text of all notices, legal symbols, copyright dates, trademark numbers, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Defines an unmanaged version information resource for this assembly with the given specifications.
trans-unit.target: 請使用指定的規格定義這個組件的 Unmanaged Version 資訊資源。

trans-unit.source: An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只有一個 unmanaged 資源相關聯的組件。

trans-unit.source: This means that calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineUnmanagedResource%2A> after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineUnmanagedResource%2A>之後呼叫其中一個方法之前將會擲回 System.ArgumentException。

trans-unit.source: Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft `ResMerge` utility (not supplied with the common language runtime SDK).
trans-unit.target: 多個未受管理的資源需要 Microsoft 之類的工具與合併`ResMerge`公用程式 （不是與 common language runtime SDK 提供）。

trans-unit.source: Empty argument strings get written as a single space.
trans-unit.target: 空白的引數的字串寫入為單一空格。

trans-unit.source: Spaces are substituted for null characters in the argument strings.
trans-unit.target: 空格會取代的引數字串中的 null 字元。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the version resource includes data that identifies the version, language, and distribution of the file.
trans-unit.target: 版本資源的結構包含可識別版本、 語言和檔案的發佈資料。

trans-unit.source: Installation programs use the functions in the file installation library (VER.DLL) to retrieve the version information resource from a file and to extract the version information blocks from the resource.
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式檔案安裝文件庫 （版本中使用函式DLL) 來擷取檔案版本資訊資源，並為從資源擷取版本資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: Returns custom attributes that have been applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" />
trans-unit.target: 傳回已套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: This argument is ignored for objects of this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型的物件會忽略這個引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes that have been applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the custom attributes; the array is empty if there are no attributes.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含自訂屬性；如果沒有屬性，則陣列是空的。

trans-unit.source: The base type from which attributes derive.
trans-unit.target: 從中衍生屬性的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: This argument is ignored for objects of this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型的物件會忽略這個引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes that have been applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" />, and that derive from a specified attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 且衍生自指定之屬性型別的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the custom attributes that are derived at any level from <paramref name="attributeType" />; the array is empty if there are no such attributes.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含衍生自 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 任何層級的自訂屬性，如果沒有這類屬性則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object supplied by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是由執行階段提供的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="attributeType" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<paramref name="attributeType" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData" /> objects that contain information about the attributes that have been applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData" /> 物件，這些物件包含已套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 之屬性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData" /> objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the current module.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData" /> 物件的泛型清單，表示已套用至目前模組之屬性 (Attribute) 的資料。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查之自訂屬性的程式碼，在僅限反映的內容中，在其中已載入僅限反映之內容的程式碼中定義的自訂屬性本身的情況下使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法<xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不能在這種情況下，因為它們可以建立屬性的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行僅限反映的內容中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information and for example code, see the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和如需範例程式碼，請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> that was specified when the current dynamic assembly was created, and sets the code base as specified.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前動態組件建立時所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />，並且依指定設定程式碼基底。

trans-unit.target: 動態組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets an incomplete list of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> objects for the assemblies that are referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 所參考組件之 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 物件的不完整清單。

trans-unit.source: An array of assembly names for the referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 受參考組件的組件名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: This array is not a complete list.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列不是完整的清單。

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a complete list of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回參考的組件的完整清單。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply a custom attribute to the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>, the assembly in which the attribute was defined is included in the list returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您套用自訂屬性以<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>，定義屬性的組件包含在這個方法所傳回的清單。

trans-unit.source: However, if you use a <xref:System.Type> object to specify the type of a method parameter, that type is not included.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您使用<xref:System.Type>以指定的方法參數，類型不是包含類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: To get a complete list of referenced assemblies, save the assembly, load it into another application domain, and call the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetReferencedAssemblies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得參考的組件的完整清單，請儲存組件，請將其載入至另一個應用程式定義域，並呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetReferencedAssemblies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.target: 型別找不到之前建立藉由呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the assembly was loaded from the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示組件是否從全域組件快取載入。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> objects always represent dynamic assemblies, and therefore are never loaded from the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> 物件一律代表對動態組件，因此永遠不會載入及從全域組件快取。

trans-unit.target: 要測試的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: This argument is ignored for objects of this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型的物件會忽略這個引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether one or more instances of the specified attribute type is applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示指定屬性類型的一或多個執行個體是否套用至這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instances of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to this dynamic assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個或多個 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的執行個體套用至這個動態組件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates that the current assembly is a dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示目前的組件是動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object always represents a dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>物件一律代表動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location, in codebase format, of the loaded file that contains the manifest if it is not shadow-copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是陰影複製，則取得包含資訊清單之已載入檔案的位置 (程式碼基底格式)。

trans-unit.source: The location of the loaded file that contains the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 包含資訊清單之載入檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the loaded file has been shadow-copied, the <see langword="Location" /> is that of the file before being shadow-copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果載入檔是已經陰影複製的，則 <see langword="Location" /> 是陰影複製前檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 叫用時晚期繫結透過機制例如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the module in the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> that contains the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder" /> 中取得模組，其中包含組件資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The manifest module.
trans-unit.target: 資訊清單模組。

trans-unit.source: Gets the grant set of the current dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前動態組件的授權集。

trans-unit.source: The grant set of the current dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 目前動態組件的授權集。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> objects can contain sensitive information such as paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> 物件可以包含機密資訊，例如路徑。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, full trust is required to access these objects.
trans-unit.target: 因此，完全信任，才能存取這些物件。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the dynamic assembly is in the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，其會表示此動態組件是否位於僅限反射內容中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dynamic assembly is in the reflection-only context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態組件位於僅反映的內容中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To emit a dynamic assembly in the reflection-only context, specify <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.ReflectionOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you create the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 若要發出動態組件的僅限反映的內容中，指定<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.ReflectionOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>當您建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic assembly is emitted in the reflection-only context, its code cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在僅限反映的內容中，就會發出動態組件，則無法執行其程式碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have saved a dynamic assembly to disk, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to load the completed assembly into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件儲存至磁碟之後，您可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法完成的組件載入僅限反映的內容。

trans-unit.source: However, the assembly can no longer be modified.
trans-unit.target: 不過，無法再修改組件。

trans-unit.source: Saves this dynamic assembly to disk.
trans-unit.target: 將此動態組件儲存到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Saves this dynamic assembly to disk.
trans-unit.target: 將此動態組件儲存到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會儲存在這個動態組件中定義的所有非暫時性動態模組。

trans-unit.source: Transient dynamic modules are not saved.
trans-unit.target: 不會儲存暫時性動態模組。

trans-unit.source: The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the modules.
trans-unit.target: 組件檔案名稱可以是下列其中一個模組的名稱相同。

trans-unit.source: If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，組件資訊清單會儲存在該模組中。

trans-unit.source: `assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyFileName` 可以是不同的所有組件內所包含之模組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，組件檔案包含組件資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> obtained using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>, this method writes the .resources file and calls <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Close%2A> to close the stream.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>使用取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>，.resources 檔案，並在呼叫這個方法會寫入<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Close%2A>關閉資料流。

trans-unit.source: The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyFileName`必須是簡單的檔案名稱沒有磁碟機或目錄的元件。

trans-unit.source: To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> methods that takes a target directory argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立組件的特定目錄中，使用其中一種<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>使用目標目錄引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this overload of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A> method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds%2CSystem.Reflection.ImageFileMachine%29> method overload with <xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.ILOnly> for the `portableExecutableKind` parameter and <xref:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine.I386> for the `imageFileMachine` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個多載的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds%2CSystem.Reflection.ImageFileMachine%29>方法多載<xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.ILOnly>如`portableExecutableKind`參數和<xref:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine.I386>如`imageFileMachine`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample creates a dynamic assembly and then persists it to a local disk using `Save`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立動態組件，然後將它保存到本機磁碟使用`Save`。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds" /> values that specifies the nature of the code.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine" /> values that specifies the target platform.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine" /> 值，用來指定目標平台。

trans-unit.source: Saves this dynamic assembly to disk, specifying the nature of code in the assembly's executables and the target platform.
trans-unit.target: 將這個動態組件儲存至磁碟，指定在組件的可執行檔和目標平台的程式碼本質。

trans-unit.source: If `imageFileMachine` and `portableExecutableKind` are incompatible, `imageFileMachine` takes precedence over `portableExecutableKind`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`imageFileMachine`和`portableExecutableKind`不相容，`imageFileMachine`優先於`portableExecutableKind`。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不會有例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify <xref:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine.I386?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.PE32Plus?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.PE32Plus?displayProperty=nameWithType> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定<xref:System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine.I386?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.PE32Plus?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds.PE32Plus?displayProperty=nameWithType>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the method that represents the entry point for this dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 方法的參考，代表這個動態組件的進入點。

trans-unit.source: The type of the assembly executable being built.
trans-unit.target: 正在建置之組件可執行檔的類型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the entry point for this assembly and defines the type of the portable executable (PE file) being built.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個組件的進入點和定義正在建置之可攜式執行檔 (PE 檔) 的類型。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.

trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
